b               "build $args"
g               "git $args"
3dc             ". ${BDO_MOD_ROOT}\contrib\3d_converter-2024-06-25\3dconverter.exe $args"
pt              ". ${BDO_MOD_ROOT}\contrib\pactool-v3\PACtool.exe $args"
j.root          "cd ${BDO_MOD_ROOT}\$args"
j.src           "cd ${BDO_MOD_ROOT}\src$args"
